channel.title: Anti Syi
channel.description:
Hi there, my name Dedian and i have been working with Devolution server for aout 3 months, i have fully removed dupes, login glitches and all the lagg, but 1 thing i am having prblems with is SYIPKERPKER who keeps connecting to my server and reuining it for my players, Since dodian was shut down 2 months ago by jagex i am trying my hardest to create a simlar adventure.
Please could someone post me in the direction of a tortorial for a Ani SYI, or even a Ip connection restricter so i only have 2 or 3 connections per ip address, i would be very happy
ANI SYI for Deltascape in the server tortorials does not work with my server because of the "Static" and the way the strings are layout
Thankyou for your time ~Dedian

item.description:

This is quite a good tutorial to stop RS2 flooder’s, it is more efficient.

item.title: Anti Syi
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Skill09 Mod Skill09
item.description:
@Mod_Skill09 wrote:

I’ll Help!

Add this to your client.java:
public String IllegalUsernameChars[] = {“SYI”, “syipkpke”, “SYIPKPKER”, “SYIPK”};

You can also edit this to keep people out with bad names that are inappropriate.

Read full topic

item.title: Anti Syi
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Dedian:

Dont help me then . . . .

Don’t worry, we won’t. We might have done if this was in the section designed for helping… This isn’t server development.
